title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to Tom Brady officially announcing his retirement and what made Brady unique in his pursuit of becoming the greatest player in NFL history. He explains what Brady's retirement means for Aaron Rodgers as he contemplates his future with the Green Bay Packers. He shares his 5 favorites moments from Brady's career, many of which would surprise you. Plus, former NFL general manager Bill Polian joins the show to tell Colin what it was like to build a team that had to compete against Brady year in and year out. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
